includeIf.querystring: select aot.*, (select employeeID from ldap where sAMAccountName=aot.callApplicant) matr from ems_ot_all_ot_calls aot where aot.callNumber='pCALLEMS' or aot.callID='pCALLEMS'

select otaot.NewValue Who ,substring(otaot.FromDate,1,16) FromDate ,substring(otaot.ToDate,1,16) ToDate ,DATEDIFF(ifnull(otaot.ToDate,curdate()),otaot.FromDate) Delta from ems_ot_all_ot_calls aot join ems_ot_all_ot_assignments otaot on aot.callID=otaot.callID where aot.callNumber='pCALLEMS' or aot.callID='pCALLEMS'

select aot.* from dbn_mr_l_mrmgt lm join ems_ot_workgroups ow on ow.UniqueID=lm.OT_GROUPID join ems_ot_all_ot_assignments oa on oa.NewValue=ow.Title join ems_ot_all_ot_calls aot on aot.callID=oa.CallID where aot.callNumber='pCALLEMS' or aot.callID='pCALLEMS'
